00026 
00027 float median(const std::vector<float> & v) {
00028         std::vector <float> u = v;
00029         long len = (long) u.size();
00030         if (len < 1) {
00031                 return 0.0f;
00032         }
00033         std::sort(u.begin(), u.end());
00034         long half = len / 2;
00035         if (len % 2 == 1) {
00036                 return u[half];
00037         }
00038         else {
00039                 return (u[half - 1] + u[half]) / 2.0f;
00040         }
00041 }
00042 
00043 DI oneSidedSignRank3(const std::vector<float> & x, const double alpha) 
00044 {
00045 //      int len = (int) x.size(); // pk unused
00046         std::vector <float> newdiff = x;
00047         int n = 0;
00048         int i;
00049         for (i = 0; i < (int) x.size(); ++i) {
00050                 if (x[i] != 0.0) {
00051                         newdiff[n] = x[i];
00052                         n++;
00053                 }
00054         }
00055         newdiff.resize(n);
00056         std::vector <float> ranks(n);
00057         for (i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00058                 ranks[i] = (float)(i + 1);
00059         }
00060 
00061         if (n == 0)
00062                 return DI(0.5, 0);
00063         else {
00064                 std::vector <DI> absdiff(n);
00065                 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00066                         absdiff[i].d = fabs(newdiff[i]);
00067                         absdiff[i].i = i;
00068                 }
00069                 std::sort(absdiff.begin(), absdiff.end());
00070                 int nTies = 0;
00071                 std::vector <int> ties(n-1);
00072                 for (i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) {
00073                         if (absdiff[i].d == absdiff[i+1].d) {
00074                                 ties[nTies] = i;
00075                                 nTies ++;
00076                         }
00077                 }
00078                 ties.resize(nTies);
00079                 int tieGroup = 0;
00080                 double doubleVarMod = 0;
00081                 if (nTies) {
00082                         i = 0;
00083                         while ( i < n - 1) {
00084                                 double initElement = absdiff[i].d;
00085                                 int tieGroupSize = 1;
00086                                 for (int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j) {
00087                                         if (absdiff[j].d == initElement) {
00088                                                 tieGroupSize ++;
00089                                                 if (j == n - 1) {
00090                                                         i = j;
00091                                                         tieGroup ++;
00092                                                         for (int m = j - tieGroupSize + 1; m <= j; ++m) {
00093                                                                 ranks[m] = (2*j - tieGroupSize + 3) / 2.0f;
00094                                                         }
00095                                                         doubleVarMod += tieGroupSize *
00096                                                                 ((double)tieGroupSize * tieGroupSize - 1);
00097                                                         break;
00098                                                 }
00099                                         }
00100                                         else {
00101                                                 i = j;
00102                                                 if (tieGroupSize > 1) {
00103                                                         tieGroup ++;
00104                                                         for (int m = j - tieGroupSize; m <= j - 1; ++m) {
00105                                                                 ranks[m] = (2 * j - tieGroupSize + 1) / 2.0f;
00106                                                         }
00107                                                         doubleVarMod += tieGroupSize *
00108                                                                 ((double)tieGroupSize * tieGroupSize - 1);
00109                                                 }
00110                                                 break;
00111                                         }
00112                                 }
00113                         }
00114                 }
00115                 std::vector <float> invr(n);
00116                 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00117                         invr[absdiff[i].i] = ranks[i];
00118                 }
00119 
00120                 double w = 0;
00121                 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00122                         if (newdiff[i] > 0)
00123                                 w += invr[i];
00124                 }
00125                 DI ans;
00126                 if (n > 11) {
00127                         double dw = w - ((double) n) * (n + 1) / 4.0;
00128                         double denom2 = (((double)n)*(n+1)*(2*n+1) - 0.5*doubleVarMod)/24.0;
00129                         if (denom2 <=0) {
00130                                 std::cerr << "denom2=" << denom2 << " dw=" << dw << std::endl;
00131                                 exit(1);
00132                         }
00133                         double z = dw / sqrt(denom2);
00134                         ans.d = 1 - normalCDF(z);
00135                 }
00136                 else {
00137                         if (nTies == 0) {
00138                                 int myCode = 0;
00139                                 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00140                                         if (newdiff[i] > 0) {
00141                                                 myCode += 1 << ((int) invr[i] - 1);
00142                                         }
00143                                 }
00144                                 ans.d = fGetPValue(n-1, myCode);
00145                         }
00146                         else {
00147                                 int twoToN = 1 << n;
00148                                 std::vector<int> mask(n);
00149                                 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00150                                         mask[i] = 1 << i;
00151                                 }
00152                                 std::vector <double> posRanks(twoToN);
00153                                 for (i = 0; i < twoToN; ++i) {
00154                                         double sum = 0;
00155                                         for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
00156                                                 if (i & mask[j])
00157                                                         sum += ranks[j];
00158                                         }
00159                                         posRanks[i] = sum;
00160                                 }
00161                                 double tail = 0;
00162                                 for (i = 0; i < twoToN; ++i) {
00163                                         if (posRanks[i] > w) {
00164                                                 tail ++;
00165                                         }
00166                                         else if (posRanks[i] == w) {
00167                                                 tail += 0.5;
00168                                         }
00169                                 }
00170                                 ans.d = tail / (double) twoToN;
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173                 ans.i = (ans.d < alpha) ? 1 : 0;
00174                 return ans;
00175         }
00176 }
00177 
00178 double normalCDF(const double x) {
00179         const double sqrt2 = 1.414213562373095048801689;
00180         double unAdjusted = 0.5 - 0.5 * erf( - x / sqrt2);
00181         if (unAdjusted > 1) {
00182                 return 1;
00183         }
00184         else if (unAdjusted < 0) {
00185                 return 0;
00186         }
00187         else {
00188                 return unAdjusted;
00189         }
00190 }
00191 
00192 double erf(const double x) 
00193 {
00194         static const int erfCoeffSize[] = {3, 7, 4};
00195         static const double erfA1[] = {-3.5609843701815385e-2,
00196                 6.9963834886191355,    2.1979261618294152e1,
00197                 2.4266795523053175e2};
00198     static const double erfB1[] = {1.5082797630407787e1,
00199                 9.1164905404514901e1,  2.1505887586986120e2};
00200         static const double erfA2[] = {-1.368648573827167067e-7,
00201                 5.641955174789739711e-1, 7.211758250883093659,
00202                 4.316222722205673530e1, 1.529892850469404039e2,
00203                 3.393208167343436870e2, 4.519189537118729422e2,
00204                 3.004592610201616005e2};
00205     static const double erfB2[] = {1.278272731962942351e1,
00206                 7.700015293522947295e1,  2.775854447439876434e2,
00207                 6.389802644656311665e2,  9.313540948506096211e2,
00208                 7.909509253278980272e2,  3.004592609569832933e2};
00209         static const double erfA3[] ={2.23192459734184686e-2,
00210                 2.78661308609647788e-1, 2.26956593539686930e-1,
00211                 4.94730910623250734e-2, 2.99610707703542174e-3};
00212     static const double erfB3[] = {1.98733201817135256,
00213                 1.05167510706793207,  1.91308926107829841e-1,
00214                 1.06209230528467918e-2};
00215         static const double erfXBounds[] = {0.46875, 4.0};
00216         static const double invSqrtPi = 0.56418958354775627928; // 1 / sqrt(pi)
00217 
00218         double absX = fabs(x);
00219         double xSquared = absX * absX;
00220         double temp = 0;
00221 
00222 
00223         if (absX <= erfXBounds[0]) {
00224                 double num = erfA1[0] * xSquared;
00225                 double den = xSquared;
00226                 int last = erfCoeffSize[0];
00227                 for (int i = 1; i < last; i++) {
00228                         num = (num + erfA1[i]) * xSquared;
00229                         den = (den + erfB1[i - 1]) * xSquared;
00230                 }
00231                 return x * (num + erfA1[last]) / (den + erfB1[last - 1]);
00232         }
00233         else {
00234                 if (absX <= erfXBounds[1]) {
00235                         double num = erfA2[0] * absX;
00236                         double den = absX;
00237                         int last = erfCoeffSize[1];
00238                         for (int i = 1; i < last; i++) {
00239                                 num = (num + erfA2[i]) * absX;
00240                                 den = (den + erfB2[i - 1]) * absX;
00241                         }
00242                         temp = (num + erfA2[last]) / (den + erfB2[last - 1]);
00243                 }
00244                 else {
00245                         double xInvSquared = 1.0 / xSquared;
00246                         double num = erfA3[0] * xInvSquared;
00247                         double den = xInvSquared;
00248                         int last = erfCoeffSize[2];
00249                         for (int i = 1; i < last; i++) {
00250                                 num = (num + erfA3[i]) * xInvSquared;
00251                                 den = (den + erfB3[i - 1]) * xInvSquared;
00252                         }
00253                         temp = xInvSquared * (num + erfA3[last]) / (den + erfB3[last - 1]);
00254                         temp = (invSqrtPi - temp) / absX;
00255                 }
00256                 temp = 1 - exp(-xSquared) * temp;
00257                 if (x > 0)      // in fact, we may use if (x > erfXBounds[0])
00258                         return temp;
00259                 else
00260                         return -temp;
00261         }
00262 }

00264 
00265 double cFraction(double x, double a, double b) {
00266         double ai = 1, bi = 1, y = 1;
00267         double aPlus1 = a + 1, aPlusB = a + b;
00268 //      double = aMinus1 = a - 1; // pk unused
00269         double z0 = 1 - x * aPlusB / aPlus1;
00270         double error = 100;
00271         for (int i = 1; i < MaxIterations; ++i) {
00272                 double aPlus2I = a + 2 * i;
00273                 double xModified = x / aPlus2I;
00274                 double c = xModified * i * (b - i) / (aPlus2I - 1);
00275                 double d = - xModified * (a + i) * (aPlusB + i) / (aPlus2I + 1);
00276                 double y1 = y + ai * c;
00277                 double y2 = y1 + y * d;
00278                 double z1 = 0, z2 = 0;
00279                 if (i == 1) {
00280                         z1 = bi * c + z0;
00281                         z2 = z1 + d * z0;
00282                 }
00283                 else {
00284                         z1 = bi * c + 1;
00285                         z2 = z1 + d;
00286                 }
00287                 ai = y1 / z2;
00288                 bi = z1 / z2;
00289                 double yold = y;
00290                 y = y2 / z2;
00291                 error = fabs(y - yold);
00292                 if (error < RelativeBound * fabs(y)) {
00293                         return y;
00294                 }
00295         }
00296         return y;
00297 }
00298 
00299 double incompleteBeta(const double x, const double a, const double b)  {
00300         if (x == 0) {
00301                 return 0;
00302         }
00303         else if (x == 1) {
00304                 return 1;
00305         }
00306         else {
00307                 double coeff = pow(x, a) * pow(1 - x, b) /
00308                         exp(logGamma(a) + logGamma(b) - logGamma(a + b));
00309                 if (x < (1.0 + a) / (2.0 + a + b)) { 
00310                         return coeff * cFraction(x, a, b) / a;
00311                 }
00312                 else {
00313                         return 1.0 - coeff * cFraction(1.0 - x, b, a) / b;
00314                 }
00315         }
00316 }
00317 double tCDF(double t, double df) {
00318         double p;
00319         if (df == 1) {
00320                 p = 0.5 + atan(t) / PI;
00321         }
00322         else {
00323                 if (t == 0) {
00324                         p = 0.5;
00325                 }
00326                 else {
00327                         double x = df / (t*t + df);
00328                         double y = 1 - incompleteBeta(x, df/2.0, 0.5);
00329                         p = (1 - y) / 2.0;
00330                         if (t > 0) {
00331                                 p = 1 - p;
00332                         }
00333                 }
00334         }
00335         if (p > 1)
00336                 return 1;
00337         else if (p < 0)
00338                 return 0;
00339         else
00340                 return p;
00341 }
00342 
00343 double tCDFinversed(double p, double df) {
00344         double t = 0;
00345         if (p == 0) {
00346                 t = -9999.0;
00347         }
00348         else if (p == 1) {
00349                 t = 9999.0;
00350         }
00351         else if (p == 0.5) {
00352                 t = 0;
00353         }
00354         else if (df == 1) {
00355                 t = tan(PI * (p - 0.5));
00356         }       
00357         else if (p < 0.5) {
00358                 t = - tCDFinversed(1 - p, df);
00359         }
00360         else {
00361                 int maxIter = 120;
00362                 double rB = 0.00001;
00363                 double aB = 0.00005;
00364 //              double coeff = exp(logGamma((df + 1) / 2.0) - logGamma(df / 2.0))
00365 //                              / sqrt(df * PI); // pk unused
00366 //              bool success = false; // pk unused
00367                 double t0 = 1;
00368                 double t1 = 2;
00369                 double p0 = tCDF(t0, df);
00370                 if (p0 == p) {
00371                         return t0;
00372                 }
00373                 double p1 = tCDF(t1, df);
00374                 if (p1 == p) {
00375                         return t1;
00376                 }
00377                 for (int i = 0; i < maxIter; ++i) {
00378                         if (p1 == p) {
00379                                 return t1;
00380                         }
00381                         else if (p0 == p) {
00382                                 return t0;
00383                         }
00384                         else if (p0 > p) {
00385                                 t1 = t0;
00386                                 p1 = p0;
00387                                 t0 = t0 / 2.0;
00388                                 p0 = tCDF(t0, df);
00389                         }
00390                         else if (p1 < p) {
00391                                 t0 = t1;
00392                                 p0 = p1;
00393                                 t1 = 2 * t1;
00394                                 p1 = tCDF(t1, df);
00395                         }
00396                         else {
00397                                 double midT = (t0 + t1) / 2.0;
00398                                 double midP = tCDF(midT, df);
00399                                 double dT = fabs(t1 - midT);
00400                                 if (midP == p || dT < aB || dT < rB * t1) {
00401                                         return midT;
00402                                 }
00403                                 else if (midP < p) {
00404                                         t0 = midT;
00405                                         p0 = tCDF(t0, df);
00406                                 }
00407                                 else {
00408                                         t1 = midT;
00409                                         p1 = tCDF(t1, df);
00410                                 }
00411                         }
00412                 }
00413         }
00414         return t;
00415 }
00416 
00417 double logGamma(const double x) {
00418         double a[8] = {5.7083835261e-03, -1.910444077728e-03,
00419                 8.4171387781295e-04, -5.952379913043012e-04,
00420                 7.93650793500350248e-04, -2.777777777777681622553e-03,
00421                 8.333333333333333331554247e-02, 0.9189385332046727417803297};
00422 
00423         double c1[9] = {4.945235359296727046734888e0,
00424                 2.018112620856775083915565e2, 2.290838373831346393026739e3,
00425                 1.131967205903380828685045e4, 2.855724635671635335736389e4,
00426                 3.848496228443793359990269e4, 2.637748787624195437963534e4,
00427                 7.225813979700288197698961e3, -5.772156649015328605195174e-1};
00428         
00429         double d1[8] = {6.748212550303777196073036e1,
00430                 1.113332393857199323513008e3, 7.738757056935398733233834e3,
00431                 2.763987074403340708898585e4, 5.499310206226157329794414e4,
00432                 6.161122180066002127833352e4, 3.635127591501940507276287e4,
00433                 8.785536302431013170870835e3};
00434      
00435         double c2[9] = {4.974607845568932035012064e0,
00436                 5.424138599891070494101986e2, 1.550693864978364947665077e4,
00437                 1.847932904445632425417223e5, 1.088204769468828767498470e6,
00438                 3.338152967987029735917223e6, 5.106661678927352456275255e6,
00439                 3.074109054850539556250927e6, 4.227843350984671393993777e-1};
00440 
00441         double d2[8] = {1.830328399370592604055942e2,
00442                 7.765049321445005871323047e3, 1.331903827966074194402448e5,
00443                 1.136705821321969608938755e6, 5.267964117437946917577538e6,
00444                 1.346701454311101692290052e7, 1.782736530353274213975932e7,
00445                 9.533095591844353613395747e6};
00446                 
00447         double c4[9] = {-1.474502166059939948905062e4,
00448                 -2.426813369486704502836312e6, -1.214755574045093227939592e8,
00449                 -2.663432449630976949898078e9, -2.940378956634553899906876e10,
00450                 -1.702665737765398868392998e11, -4.926125793377430887588120e11,
00451                 -5.606251856223951465078242e11, 1.791759469228055000094023e0};
00452 
00453         double d4[8] = {-2.690530175870899333379843e3,
00454                 -6.393885654300092398984238e5, -4.135599930241388052042842e7,
00455                 -1.120872109616147941376570e9, -1.488613728678813811542398e10,
00456                 -1.016803586272438228077304e11, -3.417476345507377132798597e11,
00457                 -4.463158187419713286462081e11};
00458 
00459         double numerator = 0;
00460         double denominator = 1;
00461         int n = 8;
00462 
00463         if (x <= Eps) {
00464                 return - log(x);
00465         }
00466         else if (x <= 0.5) {
00467                 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00468                         numerator = x * numerator + c1[i];
00469                         denominator = x * denominator + d1[i];
00470                 }
00471                 return - log(x) + x * (x * numerator / denominator + c1[n]);
00472         }
00473         else if (x <= 0.6796875) {
00474                 double z = x - 1;
00475                 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00476                         numerator = z * numerator + c2[i];
00477                         denominator = z * denominator + d2[i];
00478                 }
00479                 return -log(x) + z * (z * numerator / denominator + c2[n]);
00480         }
00481         else if (x <= 1.5) {
00482                 double z = x - 1;
00483                 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00484                         numerator = z * numerator + c1[i];
00485                         denominator = z * denominator + d1[i];
00486                 }
00487                 return z * (z * numerator / denominator + c1[n]);
00488         }
00489         else if (x <= 4) {
00490                 double z = x - 2;
00491                 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00492                         numerator = z * numerator + c2[i];
00493                         denominator = z * denominator + d2[i];
00494                 }
00495                 return z * (z * numerator / denominator + c2[n]);
00496         }
00497         else if (x <= 12) {
00498                 double z = x - 4;
00499                 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00500                         numerator = z * numerator + c4[i];
00501                         denominator = z * denominator + d4[i];
00502                 }
00503                 return z * numerator / denominator + c4[n];
00504         }
00505         else {
00506                 double z = x * x;
00507                 numerator = a[0];
00508                 for (int i = 1; i <= 6; ++i) {
00509                         numerator = numerator / z + a[i];
00510                 }
00511                 numerator /= x;
00512                 return numerator + log(x) * (x - 0.5) - x + a[7];
00513         }       
00514 }
00515 
00516 double t_distribution_lookup(const int df) {
00517         
00518         static const double dfFrom1To30[] = {
00519                 6.314, 2.920, 2.353, 2.132, 2.015,
00520                 1.943, 1.895, 1.860, 1.833, 1.812,
00521                 1.796, 1.782, 1.771, 1.761, 1.753,
00522                 1.746, 1.740, 1.734, 1.729, 1.725,
00523                 1.721, 1.717, 1.714, 1.711,     1.708,
00524                 1.706, 1.703, 1.701, 1.699, 1.697
00525         };
00526 
00527         static const double df40 = 1.684;
00528         static const double df50 = 1.676;
00529         static const double df75 = 1.665;
00530         static const double df100 = 1.660;
00531         static const double df200 = 1.653;
00532         static const double df1000 = 1.646;
00533 
00534         if (df >=1 && df <= 30)
00535                 return dfFrom1To30[df - 1];
00536         else if (df > 30 && df <= 40)
00537                 return df40;
00538         else if (df > 40 && df <= 50)
00539                 return df50;
00540         else if (df > 50 && df <= 75)
00541                 return df75;
00542         else if (df > 75 && df <= 100)
00543                 return df100;
00544         else if (df > 100 && df <= 200)
00545                 return df200;
00546         else
00547                 return df1000;
00548 }
